metadata.description: Production-ready Claude Code plugin featuring 30+ slash commands for Git automation, documentation generation, job queues, and code quality. Includes 6 specialized agents for security review, completion verification, and documentation auditing. Battle-tested workflows for software engineering teams.

plugins.name: lpclaude-config
